The item to look for
The comparer used to perform the search
False for a standard binary search. True if the should be ignored in the search. This is useful where the item's sort criteria may have changed to find out where the item should be moved to.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Core.DateTimeRange.IntersectsWith(Infragistics.Core.DateTimeRange,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns a boolean value indicating whether the specified range intersects with any part of this range.
member.param: The to which this range is compared.

Boolean value indicating the manner in which the value of the specified range's property is compared to the value of this instance's property. When true is specified, this method returns false if the start of the specified range is exactly equal to the value of this instance's property, thereby excluding the moment in time which coincides exactly with the end of this range. This parameter defaults to true.

This parameter defaults to true.
